title: Wildfire Risk Assessment Using Machine Learning
description: Developed a predictive model for wildfire risk assessment integrating satellite imagery, weather data, and historical fire records. The model achieved 87% accuracy in predicting high-risk areas.

title: Urban Heat Island Mapping
description: Created detailed heat maps of urban areas using Landsat thermal imagery and land cover classification to identify heat island effects and vulnerable neighborhoods.

title: Automated Land Cover Classification
description: Implemented a deep learning pipeline for automated land cover classification using Sentinel-2 imagery, achieving state-of-the-art results on European landscapes.
